attributes.action: Scrap the 2nd home allowance, and lower MP's basic salary to £50000 per annum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's have today awarded themselves a pay rise of 2.3%, taking their basic salary to £64700, and in light of Jacqui Smith claiming £150304 in 2nd home allowances since 2001. Some other professions have to commute into their places of work, and yet we are not awarded the same perks as MP's, we have to use our normal day to day salary to cover these things. It's time for MP's to get back in touch with the electorate.
